model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
I just visited this amazing new city. The architecture was stunning, the streets were so clean, and the people were very friendly.
Sounds like you had a great time! Which city did you visit?
It was Chicago. I had never been before, but it exceeded all my expectations.
I bet it was a nice change of scenery from our neighborhood.
Definitely. But you know, it's interesting how much our neighborhood has grown on me over the years. I remember when I first moved here, I was so unsure about it.
Yeah, I remember. But you stayed because you wanted to be here.
That's right. And since then, I've made so many great memories here. It's become my home.

[MEMORY]
Related Evidences: (1) {'Related Topics': 'Settling in a new neighborhood', 'Related Summaries': 'Neighbors A discusses moving to a new neighborhood, exploring the area, and meeting new people.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Neighbors A: Hey, Neighbors B! I just moved to a new neighborhood, and I met some of the kids who live nearby. They showed me around, and I'm starting to feel more at home. ### Neighbors B: That's great to hear, Neighbors A. I know how overwhelming it can be to move to a new place. ### Neighbors A: Yeah, it was a bit scary at first, but I'm excited to explore the area and see what's out there. ### Neighbors B: Have you found any interesting places or things to do so far? ### Neighbors A: Well, there's a park nearby that looks really nice. And I found a cute little coffee shop that I want to check out. ### Neighbors B: That sounds like fun. It's always nice to have some local spots to go to. ### Neighbors A: Definitely. It's also nice to have some friendly faces around here. I hope to make some new friends soon. ### Neighbors B: I'm sure you will, Neighbors A. You're very friendly and outgoing, so I have no doubt you'll fit right in.' }
```
